name: Ruby on Rails Developer
description:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Write clean and efficient code

  • Design robust and scalable applications

  • Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle

  • Follow best practices (TDD, CI/CD, SCRUM, code standards)

  • Integrate new technologies into application design

Rails Developer related experience and skills:

  • 2+ years of professional experience using Ruby on Rails.

  • Strong verbal and written communication skills.

  • Worked with agile methodology (Scrum).

  • Attention to detail and time management skills.

  • Knowledge in testing with Rspec.

  • Solid SQL experience (PostgreSQL, MySQL).

  • Successfully built Restful APIs, and architecture database models.

  • Understanding OOP and software design knowledge.

  • Experience with ElasticSearch and Redis.

Desirable (good to have):.

  • Familiar with SOLID design principles and Design Patterns.

  • Familiar with AWS.

What we offer:

  • Projects in Western Europe and America;

  • Career and professional growth;

  • Full cycle projects;

  • Corporate-funded training (functional training, foreign languages);

  • Benefits (Medical insurance, sports compensation, corporate presents and events, football, basketball, swimming pool);

  • Young and friendly team;

  • Stable pay (100% official).

Further Information:

  • Type of contract: Full time

  • Location: Office, Remote
